modName: Drath Samid Hand Painted Map Of Skyrim
summary:
Hi my name is Zardoz Xerxes and I made this map! 
I produced this handmade fan-art map of Skyrim.
Drath Samid is my Elder Scrolls name! :)
descriptionHtml:
Update! 
Great news everybody! I\'m still working on this mod and have a new version available!

NEW Imperial battle map replacement version!
Replace all the battle maps with my full colour hand painted version!
Including a brand new version for the marked battle map!
See the new screens above and the files tab for the download.

Full pic on deviantart:
http://samofsuthsax.deviantart.com/art/Drath-Samid-s-map-of-Skyrim-361505734?q=gallery%3Asamofsuthsax&qo=0

now you can also enjoy it in the game!

The map uses the same mesh as the dragon burials map
but in another .nif so as not to conflict with anything.

You can find the map on a table in Embershard Mine near Riverwood.
You can use the console to load it with the command:

coc EmbershardMine01 

You can scale the map using the console, open the console \\\"Â¬\\\",
click on the map in world, now type 

setscale 2 

to make it twice as big 3 for thrice and so on.
This will not make the map big right away, first you have to
reset the map using the console again type: 

Disable

and then: 

Enable

The map should now be the size you selected.

You can follow me on Steam, Youtube, Facebook and Twitter under the name Zardoz Xerxes.
author: Zardoz Xerxes
